name: Gentrilab
description: Development of a Multiagent System for the Analysis of Gentrification in Latin America, an Agent-Based Model
releaseNotes:
The **inmuebles_ini** slider allows you to configure the geographical space with the initial properties (residences and / or commerces). Supports integer values between 1 and 100.
The **nivel_vida** slider allows you to assign the initial inhabitants life level. It allows controlling integer values between 1 and 100.
The slider **distribucion** refers to the distribution of the properties according to their type (residential / commercial).
The **interes_privado** slider allows you to simulate the presence or not of private investment. You can assign values in the interval [0,1]
Once the desired initial values are configured, we click on SET and then Go to visualize the emerging results.
